overview: A secret is only good if you confide that secret to someone else, and these gorgeous girls are glad they confided in their best friends about their lesbian fantasy because their pals have a confession as well they too want to tell My Lesbian Secret. With it out in the open these best friends can fulfill every lesbian utopia and they certainly do. From sipping from the furry cup to a three-way girly orgy, they indulge their lesbian indulgences, their secret is well and truly out of the bag in two hours of 100% lesbian loving.
title: My Lesbian Secret
